title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't set the context correctly for nested classes
description: When using the New Class wizard, the Enclosing Type field does not default to the current type in the editor.
OB: Build 20011106 - With a .java file open in the editor, click the New Class button. Check the Enclosing Type field.
EB: The Enclosing Type field is blank by default.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor. 
2. Click the New Class button. 
3. Check the Enclosing Type field. It should default to the current type in the editor.
